Create And Sell Your NFTs

Set up your wallet

once you have set up your wallet of choice , connect it to OpenSea by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner . Learn about the wallet we support.

Create your Collection

click my collection and set your collection. Add social link , a discraption , profile and , Banner images , and set a secondary slaes fees

Add your NFTs

Upload your work (image , video , audio ,or 3D art ), add a title or discraption , and castumaize your NFTs With properties , states , and unlockable content.

List them for sale

choose Between auctions , fixed price listing , and declining prices listing . you choose how do you want to sell your NFTs , and we help you sell them.
